post.body: Looking 2 buy a BIG present this Christmas? Our two gorgeous Rhino's are now up for adoption! Adopt 2day @ http://tinyurl.com.au/x.php?1kxo
Australia Zoo is at the top of the list for RACQ's 150 Must Dos in Queensland! Vote for us daily at http://tinyurl.com.au/x.php?1krg
Guy Sebastian, Brian McFadden, Bindi and the Crocmen & John Williamson LIVE at the Zoo! Get your ticket @ http://tinyurl.com.au/x.php?1kbo
Get your ticket 2 Summer Down Under -the coolest concert series to hit the Crocoseum stage! Check it out @ http://tinyurl.com.au/x.php?1kbo
Crikey! Don't miss Robert's 5th Birthday party today at Australia Zoo! And for today only, ALL KIDS GET IN FREE! Wooo-Hoo!
Crikey! Postman Pat, Bananas in Pyjamas and Spot R performing LIVE on Robert's 5th Birthday at the Zoo. Details at http://tinyurl.com/5g2hw3
Just four days until Robert's 5th Birthday at Australia Zoo! And 2 celebrate this milestone, ALL kids get in FREE! http://tinyurl.com/5g2hw3
The Zoo crew have recovered from a huge Steve Irwin Day and preparations for Robert's 5th Birthday are underway! http://tinyurl.com/5g2hw3
Thanks to everyone for your messages, emails, fund raising efforts, donations and support for an amazing Steve Irwin Day. Wooo-Hoo!
1in 3 marine mammals are facing extinction. You can make a difference.
Bindi is now performing at the Gala dinner. Such a trooper.
time for the Steve Irwin Day gala dinner.
Thank you for watching us live today. Continue Steve's dream. Don't ever give up. http://snurl.com/5iiuc
Stu is doing the croc show. Stu has been on the Croc Team for a long time and was trained personally by Stevo. http://snurl.com/5ia98
We are back with the bird show. I hope Jeremy can track down his birds.
Good job flipper.
We're back with the Wildlife Warriors show. http://snurl.com/5ia98
We'll be back in the crocoseum in 10 minutes. http://snurl.com/5ia98
Stay tuned, we can't stream Thirsty Merc, we are going to look at some cool things happening in the zoo. Back in 5 minutes.
We're auctioning off some awesome items to raise money to save wildlife. If you want to help out donate to our cause. http://snurl.com/5ibis
Oh no! Australia Zoo has slipped to number 2 on RACQ's 150 Must Dos list! Help us get to number ONE! Vote @ http://www.australiazoo.com.au/
